chart.title: Forwarder Version Visualized
chart.searchString: index="_internal" source="*metrics.log" group=tcpin_connections hostname=* | eval version=if(isnull(version),"4.2(-)",version) | eval os=if(isnull(os),"n/a",os) | dedup guid sourceIp version | chart count over version by os limit=0 | foreach 4* 5* 6* [eval <<FIELD>> = if('<<FIELD>>'="0",null(),'<<FIELD>>')]

table.title: Data Volume - Last 7 Days (GB)
table.searchString: index="_internal" source="*metrics.log" group=tcpin_connections hostname=* | eval version=if(isnull(version),"4.2(-)",version) | eval os=if(isnull(os),"n/a",os) | eval os=if(isnull(os),"n/a",os) | chart sum(kb) AS kb over os by version limit=0 | foreach 4* 5* 6* [eval <<FIELD>> = round('<<FIELD>>' / 1024 / 1024)]
